snippet: For an area that remains isolated from many critical resources one month after Hurricane Sandy, the free H train shuttle service is a welcome signal of relief.
abstract: Free H train shuttle service offers welcome relief through stretch of the Rockaways devastated by Hurricane Sandy, making limited stops and connecting area that remains isolated from many critical resources one month after the storm.
lead_paragraph: For an area that remains isolated from many critical resources one month after Hurricane Sandy, the free H train shuttle service is a welcome signal of relief.

headline.seo: Shuttle Train Points to Progress in the Rockaways
headline.main: A Forlorn Shuttle Points to Progress in the Rockaways
headline.print_headline: A Forlorn Shuttle Points to Progress In the Rockaways
